verses.verse: <S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> God, for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> up to my <S%H5315>neck!<s%>

I <S%H2883>sink<s%> in <S%H4688>deep<s%> <S%H3121>mire,<s%> where there is no <S%H4613>foothold.<s%> I have <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> where the <S%H7641>floods<s%> overflow <S%H7857>me.<s%>
I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> with my <S%H7121>crying.<s%> My <S%H1627>throat<s%> is <S%H2787>dry.<s%> My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail,<s%> <S%H3176>looking<s%> for my <S%H430>God.<s%>

Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me without a <S%H2600>cause<s%> are <S%H7231>more<s%> than the <S%H8185>hairs<s%> of my <S%H7218>head.<s%> Those who want to cut me <S%H6789>off,<s%> being my <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H8267>wrongfully,<s%> are <S%H6105>mighty.<s%> I have to <S%H7725>restore<s%> what I <S%H1497>didn't<s%> take away.
<S%H430>God,<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H200>foolishness.<s%> My <S%H819>sins<s%> <S%H3582>aren't<s%> hidden from you.

<S%H6960>Don't<s%> let those who wait for you be <S%H954>shamed<s%> through <S%H136>me,<s%> Lord <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%> <S%H1245>Don't<s%> let those who seek you be brought to <S%H3637>dishonor<s%> through <S%H430>me,<s%> God of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Because for your <S%H5375>sake,<s%> I have borne <S%H2781>reproach.<s%> <S%H3639>Shame<s%> has <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>
I have become a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> to my <S%H251>brothers,<s%> an <S%H5237>alien<s%> to my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1121>children.<s%>
For the <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H398>consumes<s%> <S%H2781>me.<s%> The reproaches of those who <S%H2778>reproach<s%> you have fallen on <S%H5307>me.<s%>
When I <S%H1058>wept<s%> and <S%H5315>I<s%> <S%H6685>fasted,<s%> that was to my <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
When I <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> my <S%H3830>clothing,<s%> I became a byword to <S%H4912>them.<s%>
Those who sit <S%H3427>in<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H7878>talk<s%> about <S%H5058>me.<s%> I am the song of the <S%H8354>drunkards.<s%>

But as for <S%H8605>me,<s%> my prayer is to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, in an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> me in the <S%H571>truth<s%> of your <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H2916>mire,<s%> and <S%H2883>don't<s%> let me sink. Let me be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H4615>me,<s%> and out of the deep <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

<S%H4325>Don't<s%> let the flood waters <S%H7857>overwhelm<s%> <S%H4688>me,<s%> neither let the deep swallow me <S%H1104>up.<s%> <S%H875>Don't<s%> let the pit <S%H332>shut<s%> its mouth on <S%H6310>me.<s%>

<S%H6030>Answer<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, for your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%> According to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your tender <S%H7356>mercies,<s%> turn to <S%H6437>me.<s%>
<S%H5641>Don't<s%> hide your <S%H6440>face<s%> from your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> for I am in <S%H6887>distress.<s%> <S%H6030>Answer<s%> me <S%H4118>speedily!<s%>
Draw <S%H7126>near<s%> to my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H1350>redeem<s%> <S%H6299>it.<s%> Ransom me because of my <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
You <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> my <S%H2781>shame,<s%> and my <S%H1322>dishonor.<s%> My adversaries are all before <S%H6887>you.<s%>

<S%H2781>Reproach<s%> has <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and I am full of <S%H5136>heaviness.<s%> I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for some to take <S%H5110>pity,<s%> but there was <S%H5162>none;<s%> for comforters, but I found <S%H4672>none.<s%>
They also <S%H5414>gave<s%> me <S%H7219>gall<s%> for my <S%H1267>food.<s%> In my <S%H6772>thirst,<s%> they gave me <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>
Let their <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them become a <S%H6341>snare.<s%> May it become a <S%H7965>retribution<s%> and a <S%H4170>trap.<s%>
Let their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> be <S%H2821>darkened,<s%> so that they <S%H7200>can't<s%> see. Let their <S%H4975>backs<s%> be <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H4571>bent.<s%>
Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on <S%H2740>them.<s%> Let the fierceness of your <S%H639>anger<s%> overtake <S%H5381>them.<s%>
Let their <S%H2918>habitation<s%> be <S%H8074>desolate.<s%> Let no one <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>
For they <S%H7291>persecute<s%> him whom you have <S%H5221>wounded.<s%> They <S%H5608>tell<s%> of the <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> of those whom you have <S%H2491>hurt.<s%>
<S%H5414>Charge<s%> them with <S%H5771>crime<s%> upon <S%H5771>crime.<s%> <S%H935>Don't<s%> let them come into your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
Let them be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H2416>life,<s%> and not be <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
But I am in <S%H6041>pain<s%> and <S%H3510>distress.<s%> Let your <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> protect <S%H7682>me.<s%>
I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H7892>song,<s%> and will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> him with <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%>
It will <S%H3190>please<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3190>better<s%> than an <S%H7794>ox,<s%> or a <S%H7794>bull<s%> that has <S%H7160>horns<s%> and <S%H6536>hoofs.<s%>
The <S%H6035>humble<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H8055>it,<s%> and are glad. You who <S%H1875>seek<s%> after <S%H430>God,<s%> let your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H2421>live.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H34>needy,<s%> and <S%H959>doesn't<s%> despise his captive <S%H615>people.<s%>
Let <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3220>him;<s%> the seas, and everything that moves <S%H7430>therein!<s%>
For <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> They shall settle there, and own it.
The <S%H2233>children<s%> also of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H157>it.<s%> Those who love his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall dwell <S%H7931>therein.<s%>
